definition: (of ideas, images, representations, expressions) characterized by perfect conformity to fact or truth, take as an undesirable consequence of some event or state of affairs
details:
adjective
- (of ideas, images, representations, expressions) characterized by perfect conformity to fact or truth
= synonyms: accurate
- marked by strict and particular and complete accordance with fact
= example: marked by strict and particular and complete accordance with fact
verb
- take as an undesirable consequence of some event or state of affairs
= synonyms: take
- claim as due or just
= synonyms: demand
